com.davidbracewell.hermes.annotator

Class SentenceLevelAnnotator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidbracewell.hermes.annotator.SentenceLevelAnnotator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Annotator, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultPhraseChunkAnnotator, DefaultPOSAnnotator, LexiconAnnotator, MaltParserAnnotator, OpenNLPPOSAnnotator, TokenTypeEntityAnnotator, ViterbiAnnotator, WordNetAnnotator

    public abstract class SentenceLevelAnnotator
extends Object
implements Annotator, Serializable

    Annotates all sentences in the document in parallel.

    Author:
    David B. Bracewell
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • furtherRequires

        protected Set<AnnotationType> furtherRequires()
        The annotation types beyond sentence and token that are also required. By default will return an empty Set.
        Returns:
        The annotations beyond sentence and token that are required for this annotator to perform annotation
